data.actual_result: Incorrect text as "Select a channel or category...".
data.expected_result: It should be written "Select a channel or user..." as these are the only options you can share any message. You can't share a message to a channel category.
data.short_description: Incorrect text "Select a channel or category..." under "Share to" option while sharing a message.
data.steps_to_repro: - Switch on developer mode. - Tap hold, and share a message. - Notice the default text in the text field "Share to" written as "Select a channel or category...".
